fields.name: title
fields.description: title of the work; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: alternative_title
fields.description: can include additional publication details such as year and number, eg: 'Vol. 2 (1991/1992), PP no. 384 of 1993'

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: contributors such as government agencies or committees; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: publisher
fields.description: multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: date
fields.description: publication date; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: type
fields.description: eg: 'text'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: format
fields.description: eg: 'Book', 'volume'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: extent
fields.description: size or physical dimensions, can include number of pages or number of words; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: language
fields.description: publication language; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: subject
fields.description: associated subject headings; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: is_part_of
fields.description: collections or series this publication is part of; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: library identifiers; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: rights
fields.description: copyright and licensing information; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: pages
fields.description: number of digitised pages (includes covers and endleaves)

fields.name: fulltext_url
fields.description: link to digitised book viewer

fields.name: fulltext_url_text
fields.description: text of link to digitised book viewer

fields.name: text_download_url
fields.description: link to download OCRd text of book

fields.name: catalogue_url
fields.description: link to NLA catalogue; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_url
fields.description: link to work record in Trove; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_type
fields.description: Trove work format, eg: 'Book'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: parent
fields.description: parent work identifiers; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: parent_url
fields.description: parent work links; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: children
fields.description: child work identifiers; multiple values separated by | symbol
